abstract: Exhibition Earth, on view at ArtsWestchester's Arts Exchange in White Plains, presents ceramics focusing on environmental concerns, each piece addressing aspect of complex realm of nature, sustainability and community's power to effect change (Metropolitan/Westchester).
snippet: The ArtsWestchester show in White Plains presents works by more than ceramic 70 artists focusing on environmental concerns.
lead_paragraph: The ArtsWestchester show in White Plains presents works by more than ceramic 70 artists focusing on environmental concerns.

headline.main: What the Earth Gives, and What It Inspires
headline.print_headline: What the Earth Gives, And What It Inspires
headline.seo: In ‘Earth,’ the Work of Ceramic Artists Is Displayed
